Since the Verus mainnet is already live, what's the point of joining the community and learning about the protocol?

Actually, the Verus mainnet is not yet live. It will go live on May 21, 2023, with the activation expected to target block 2,546,600. So, joining the community and learning about the protocol can help you get ahead of the game and be prepared for the mainnet launch.
